verses.verse: My spirit <S%H7307><s%> is consumed <S%H2254><s%>, my days <S%H3117><s%> are extinct <S%H2193><s%>, The grave is ready for me <S%H6913><s%>.
Surely there are mockers <S%H2049><s%> with me <S%H5869><s%>, And mine eye dwelleth <S%H3885><s%> upon their provocation <S%H4784><s%>.
Give <S%H7760><s%> now a pledge <S%H6148><s%>, be surety for me with thyself <S%H8628><s%>; Who is there that will strike hands with me <S%H3027><s%>?
For thou hast hid <S%H6845><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> from understanding <S%H7922><s%>: Therefore shalt thou not exalt them <S%H7311><s%>.
He that denounceth <S%H5046><s%> his friends <S%H7453><s%> for a prey <S%H2506><s%>, Even the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> shall fail <S%H3615><s%>.
But he hath made <S%H3322><s%> me a byword <S%H4914><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>; And they <S%H6440><s%> spit in my face <S%H8611><s%>.
Mine eye <S%H5869><s%> also is dim <S%H3543><s%> by reason of sorrow <S%H3708><s%>, And all my members <S%H3338><s%> are as a shadow <S%H6738><s%>.
Upright <S%H3477><s%> men shall be astonished <S%H8074><s%> at this <S%H5355><s%>, And the innocent shall stir up <S%H5782><s%> himself against the godless <S%H2611><s%>.
Yet shall the righteous <S%H6662><s%> hold <S%H270><s%> on his way <S%H1870><s%>, And he that hath clean <S%H2890><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> shall wax <S%H3254><s%> stronger and stronger <S%H555><s%>.
But <S%H199><s%> as for you all <S%H7725><s%>, come on now <S%H935><s%> again <S%H4672><s%>; And I shall not find a wise man among you <S%H2450><s%>.
My days <S%H3117><s%> are past <S%H5674><s%>, my purposes <S%H2154><s%> are broken off <S%H5423><s%>, Even the thoughts <S%H4180><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%>.
They change <S%H7760><s%> the night <S%H3915><s%> into day <S%H3117><s%>: The light <S%H216><s%>, say they <S%H7138><s%>, is near unto <S%H6440><s%> the darkness <S%H2822><s%>.
If I look <S%H6960><s%> for Sheol <S%H7585><s%> as my house <S%H1004><s%>; If I have spread <S%H7502><s%> my couch <S%H3326><s%> in the darkness <S%H2822><s%>;
If I have said <S%H7121><s%> to corruption <S%H7845><s%>, Thou art my father <S%H1><s%>; To the worm <S%H7415><s%>, Thou art my mother <S%H517><s%>, and my sister <S%H269><s%>;
Where then is <S%H645><s%> my hope <S%H8615><s%>? And as for my hope <S%H8615><s%>, who shall see it <S%H7789><s%>?
It shall go down <S%H3381><s%> to the bars <S%H905><s%> of Sheol <S%H7585><s%>, When once there is rest <S%H5183><s%> in <S%H3162><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%>.
